commit.message: Merge #6631 6631: Gate autoimports begind experimental completions flag r=kjeremy a=SomeoneToIgnore Part of https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/6612 Adds a possibility to disable autoimports: and other experimental completions we might want to add later. Co-authored-by: Kirill Bulatov

verification.payload: tree de4a605a37481f12db88ae8fc9dc00cd2bc801b0 parent 5478aaebfe4d9d2ad7745702932bf40b2cad226b parent 9812150047ea5f53631762e83ed25177e821857f author bors[bot] <26634292+bors[bot]@users.noreply.github.com> 1606261205 +0000 committer GitHub 1606261205 +0000 Merge #6631 6631: Gate autoimports begind experimental completions flag r=kjeremy a=SomeoneToIgnore Part of https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/6612 Adds a possibility to disable autoimports: and other experimental completions we might want to add later. Co-authored-by: Kirill Bulatov

files.patch:
@@ -460,6 +460,11 @@
                     "default": true,
                     "markdownDescription": "Whether to show postfix snippets like `dbg`, `if`, `not`, etc."
                 },
+                "rust-analyzer.completion.enableExperimental": {
+                    "type": "boolean",
+                    "default": true,
+                    "markdownDescription": "Display additional completions with potential false positives and performance issues"
+                },
                 "rust-analyzer.callInfo.full": {
                     "type": "boolean",
                     "default": true,
